name: Golden Sight
description:
Seekers of the "gold" in the Downtown!

You will find it difficult to make this journey alone, as if everything you see is preventing you from finding the only noble thing ...... But don't be discouraged, fella! Me, the gentleman of Uptown will follow your steps and guide you on your way.

So no fear, use your keyboard and follow my lead, voyager!

Just pass on the hope you collect from your journey to me, and your determination will shine brightly like the gold.
